about_the_game:
Blinky’s Hasty Adventure is a punishing 3D Platforming game.
The isometric camera adds a new perspective to the well-known genre of 3D platforming games.
Built towards speedrunning, players will be presented with short yet tough levels where mastering character movement is the key to success.
Maneuver your way through level with each their unique elements and compete for a place of the leaderboards.
detailed_description:
Blinky’s Hasty Adventure is a punishing 3D Platforming game.
The isometric camera adds a new perspective to the well-known genre of 3D platforming games.
Built towards speedrunning, players will be presented with short yet tough levels where mastering character movement is the key to success.
Maneuver your way through level with each their unique elements and compete for a place of the leaderboards.

name: Blinky - Rise to the Top

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core 2.6GHz or higher (i5 or i7 series Intel processor or AMD equivalent).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 860m or better, or AMD equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core 2.6GHz or higher (i5 or i7 series Intel processor or AMD equivalent).
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 960m or better, or AMD equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Speedrunning 3D Platforming game, learn to traverse short yet challenging levels, then try climbing up the Leaderboard!
